### wandb_upload

>      wandb_upload (artifact_name:str, *path:str, project=None, type='dataset',
>                    run=None)

*Uploads files or dir to wandb*

``` python
with WandbRun(project='test', job_type='test') as run:
    wandb_upload('test_upload', '01v_utils.wandb.ipynb', run=run)
```
